channel.title: Need help with right click commands

item.title: Need help with right click commands
item.dc:creator: @i_own_pking i_own_pking
item.description:
@i_own_pking wrote:

Hi, i know how to make it so that admins cant trade, attack or duel people but how can i make it so that other players cant do it to them? this is the code

if (playerRights < 2) { outStream.createFrameVarSize(104); outStream.writeByteC(4); // command slot (does it matter which one?) outStream.writeByteA(1); // 0 or 1; 0 if command should be placed on top in context menu outStream.writeString("Trade with"); outStream.endFrameVarSize(); }

Thanks[br][size=1]Posted on: July 24, 2007, 04:51:34 AM[/size][hr]Anyone?

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with right click commands
